alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Washtenaw County through 530 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tecumseh, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Manchester around 445 PM EDT. Saline around 450 PM EDT. Ann Arbor around 500 PM EDT. Chelsea and Dexter around 505 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Hudson Mills, Pittsfield Township, Lyndon Township, Hudson Mills Metropark, Bridgewater, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake and Barton Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
